creditline: Gift of Paula and Mac Lee in honor of Ted Hartwell
description: two long bridges across pontoons; tents, horses and figures on opposite riverbank; carts, figures and two simple lean-tos on near bank
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

below image, printed on mount: [Negative by T.H. O\'Sullivan. Entered according to act of congress, in the year 1866, by A. Gardner, in the Clerk\'s Office of the District Court of the District of Columbia. Positive by A. GARDENER, 511 7th st., Washington./ PONTOON BRIDGE ACROSS THE RAPPAHANNOCK./ No. 32. May, 1863] on back of mount, in pencil: [ZZ1254]
markings: on back of mount, stamped in blue: [2396]
portfolio: From From "Gardener's Photographic Sketch Book of the Civil War"
title: Pontoon Bridge, Across the Rappahannock River, Virginia
